title: Analysis of f based on table of values for f, f' part - c

content.description: Let f be a function that is differentiable for all real numbers. The table above gives the values of f and its derivative f' for selected points x in the closed interval <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <mn>1.5</mn> <mo>≤</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>≤</mo> <mn>1.5</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacqGHsislcaaIXaGaaiOlaiaaiwdacqGHKjYOcaWG4bGaeyizImQa aGymaiaac6cacaaI1aaaaa@3FC2@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>. The second derivative of f has the property that f''(x) > 0 for <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <mn>1.5</mn> <mo>≤</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>≤</mo> <mn>1.5</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacqGHsislcaaIXaGaaiOlaiaaiwdacqGHKjYOcaWG4bGaeyizImQa aGymaiaac6cacaaI1aaaaa@3FC2@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>.
content.question: Find a positive real number r having the property that there must exist a value c with 0 < c < 0.5 and f''(c) = r. Give a reason for your answer.

frqParts.text: Find a positive real number r having the property that there must exist a value c with 0 < c < 0.5 and f''(c) = r. Give a reason for your answer.

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Provide reasons or rationales for solutions and conclusions.
